discussion.content:
D
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-Access/services/workspaceoneaccess_connector_migration_2001/GUID-4144EAF6-A7AE-4CCB-82E0-1A11D723E898.html
"The Workspace ONE Access 20.01 connector does not support Virtual Apps (Citrix, Horizon, Horizon Cloud, and ThinApps integrations). If your environment includes Virtual Apps or you plan to use Virtual Apps in the future, do not migrate to Workspace ONE Access 20.01 connectors."

When troubleshooting group syncs through the AirWatch Cloud Connector, which log file should be reviewed?

discussion.content:
Answer is correct. "CloudConnector.log Contains information about ACC Services such as directory authentication, group syncs,
communication with CA/PKI, PowerShell, syslog, and additional ACC services."

https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-UEM/1909/WS1_Logging.pdf

Answer shoud be A, B, D
